name: Lava Jump!
description:
This is a small game made in a week by Nicolas Vogelbusch and Benjamin Rose. The theme was JUMP and that's what you have to do! Jump to the goal and try not to touch the lava or you DIE!

Course:  Game a Week Professor:  Csongor Baranyai Game Design :  Nicolas Vogelbusch & Benjamin Rose Coding:  Benjamin Rose Game Art:  Nicolas Vogelbusch Gametester:  Suzanne Bogaard , Robin Struss,  Jawad Srour, Carla Rother, Cagatay Aydin, Sebastian Stamm
